title: Lab coat

| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Appearance                                                                            | white coat                                                                                                                                                                             |
|                                                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| Slot                                                                                  | [cloak](/wiki/Cloak "Cloak")                                                                                                                                                           |
| AC                                                                                    | [1](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")                                                                                                                                                   |
| Special                                                                               | - [MC3](/wiki/Magic_cancellation "Magic cancellation")
- [acid resistance](/wiki/Acid_resistance "Acid resistance")
- [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance") |
|                                                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| Base price                                                                            | 60 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                                                                                                       |
| Weight                                                                                | [10](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                                                                            |
| Material                                                                              | [cloth](/wiki/Cloth "Cloth")                                                                                                                                                           |

A **lab coat** is a type of [cloak](/wiki/Cloak "Cloak") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). It is made of [cloth](/wiki/Cloth "Cloth"), and appears as a **white coat** when unidentified.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)
- [2 Description](#Description)
- [3 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [4 References](#References)

## Generation

In addition to random generation, [Doctor Frankenstein](/wiki/Doctor_Frankenstein "Doctor Frankenstein") is guaranteed to [generate with one](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory").

## Description

When worn, a lab coat provides [acid resistance](/wiki/Acid_resistance "Acid resistance"), [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance") and [MC](/wiki/MC "MC")3.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

## Strategy

The lab coat is a strict upgrade from the [alchemy smock](/wiki/Alchemy_smock "Alchemy smock"), providing the same extrinsics with better magic cancellation. Like the alchemy smock, it is a great aid in obtaining intrinsic poison resistance without suffering any stat loss; once you become poison-resistant (or start as a poison-resistant race or role), you may prefer a [cloak of protection](/wiki/Cloak_of_protection "Cloak of protection") or a [cloak of magic resistance](/wiki/Cloak_of_magic_resistance "Cloak of magic resistance").

The lab coat becomes becomes one of the best choices for a cloak in the late game, due to the presence of very powerful acidic monsters such as the [giant shoggoth](/wiki/Giant_shoggoth "Giant shoggoth"). Characters that have another source of [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance") should strongly consider a lab coat for their cloak slot and [grease](/wiki/Grease "Grease") it if they desire - the [oilskin cloak](/wiki/Oilskin_cloak "Oilskin cloak") is largely superseded by the [ring of free action](/wiki/Ring_of_free_action "Ring of free action") in SLASH'EM and its variants for protection against [drowning](/wiki/Drowning "Drowning") attacks.

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [do\_wear.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 206](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/do_wear.c#line206 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/do wear.c")

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Lab coat

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
[   Lab coat  
Appearance white coat
Slot cloak
AC 1
Special
  • MC3
  • acid resistance
  • poison resistance
Base price 60 zm
Weight 10
Material cloth

A lab coat is a type of cloak that appears in SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM. It is made of cloth, and appears as a white coat when unidentified.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
  • 2 Description
  • 3 Strategy
  • 4 References

Generation

In addition to random generation, Doctor Frankenstein is guaranteed to generate with one.

Description

When worn, a lab coat provides acid resistance, poison resistance and MC3.[1]

Strategy

The lab coat is a strict upgrade from the alchemy smock, providing the same extrinsics with better magic cancellation. Like the alchemy smock, it is a great aid in obtaining intrinsic poison resistance without suffering any stat loss; once you become poison-resistant (or start as a poison-resistant race or role), you may prefer a cloak of protection or a cloak of magic resistance.

The lab coat becomes becomes one of the best choices for a cloak in the late game, due to the presence of very powerful acidic monsters such as the giant shoggoth. Characters that have another source of magic resistance should strongly consider a lab coat for their cloak slot and grease it if they desire - the oilskin cloak is largely superseded by the ring of free action in SLASH'EM and its variants for protection against drowning attacks.

References

  1. ↑ do_wear.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 206
